source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video opens with a view down a narrow, paved alleyway. A building with a light green metal door, adorned with posters and graffiti, occupies the right foreground, alongside a sticker-covered drainpipe and a curtained window. A low concrete wall runs along the left foreground and middle ground. Beyond the wall, train tracks are visible in the middle ground, leading towards a distant cityscape with a domed building in the background center, all under a clear sky at the top of the frame. Subsequently, a pair of hands, clad in a black jacket, enters from the bottom of the frame, raising a black digital camera into the center foreground. The camera is aimed at the cityscape, and its screen, displaying this view, becomes the central focus, with the original background cityscape now visible around and above the camera. The perspective is consistently first-person, at eye level.
